title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 19 February 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:03 <abusenius> has quit  
00:23 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
00:30 <abusenius> has quit  
01:55 <jvelo> has quit  
02:54 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
02:54 <jvdrean> has quit  
05:28 <DrLou> has quit  
09:44 <sdumitriu> has quit  
09:45 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
10:54 <evalica> has quit  
11:14 <SvenDowideit> has quit  
11:14 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki  
12:21 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
13:18 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
13:37 <jvdrean> has quit  
13:52 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:18 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
14:25 <vmassol> has quit  
15:41 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
15:41 <jvdrean> has quit  
15:47 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
15:54 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
15:55 <jvdrean> has quit  
15:56 <vmassol> has quit  
16:21 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
17:32 <vmassol> sdumitriu: hi. Would you know by any chance how to do a XWQL query with a where on a static list field?  
17:32 <@sdumitriu> Nope, sorry  
17:33 <vmassol> k, I'll try to dig more, found "member of" but can't seem to sue that properly  
17:33 <vmassol> ah found an example on http://incubator.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWQL/WebHome, trying  
17:34 <vmassol> doesn't seem to work, I get a npe  
17:39 <vmassol> ok found the solution  
17:40 <vmassol> it works if I set "relational storage" on the static list field....  
17:40 <@sdumitriu> Ah, yes  
17:40 <@sdumitriu> Always do that  
17:41 <@sdumitriu> Since a multiselect without relational storage is just a large piece of text  
17:41 <@sdumitriu> And doing LIKE queries is very bad for performance  
17:41 <vmassol> ok…  
20:31 <vmassol> sdumitriu: I have a strange behavior… I have this query: "select distinct committer.id, committer.aliases, committer.avatar, committer.name from Document doc, doc.object(GitHubCode.CommitterClass) as committer". committer.aliases is a static list and this query only returns entries for committers who have aliases set...  
20:31 <vmassol> any idea?  
20:34 <vmassol> strangely if I remove 'relational storage' from that field it works fine  
20:37 <vmassol> has quit  
20:43 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
21:24 <CIA-120> Jerome Velociter ldap-ui \* r6ebdf6c https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/6ebdf6cf1d3fb15f7b9d5e22001b6fa7ac21dc63 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-ldap/xwiki-platform-ldap-ui/src/main/resources/XWiki/AdminLdapSheet.xml : XWIKI-2551 Create a LDAP administration app - http://git.io/fBQH3w  
21:35 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: Please use a different color, I can't stand that pink  
21:36 <vmassol> sdumitriu: what pink? you have a link?  
21:36 <@sdumitriu> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Git+Module/jgit-example1.png  
21:36 <vmassol> ah I kind of like it :)  
21:36 <@sdumitriu> I know  
21:37 <vmassol> it's the default ping from skitch actually  
21:37 <vmassol> sdumitriu: check this: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/GitHub+Application/committers-xwiki-20120219.png  
21:37 <vmassol> all stats from the beginning  
21:39 <@sdumitriu> It's not quite "the" beginning  
21:39 <vmassol> I was wondering if it were the beginning or not  
21:39 <@sdumitriu> Since we lost a big part of the history when we did a move  
21:39 <vmassol> ah?  
21:39 <vmassol> I thought we took a lot of care not to loose anything  
21:40 <vmassol> (but I was surprised to see ludovic only with 200 or so commits)  
21:40 <@sdumitriu> Starts with:  
21:40 <@sdumitriu> XWIKI-1393: SVN reorganization to take into account the different XWiki products  
21:40 <vmassol> so it's only the stats from the move to git?  
21:40 <@sdumitriu> Which was r3655 in svn  
21:40 <vmassol> hmmm  
21:41 <vmassol> there are guys like roverwolf mentioned  
21:41 <vmassol> or sgaide  
21:41 <vmassol> they were very old committers  
21:43 <@sdumitriu> Ah, no, I was looking in the wrong place (enterprise)  
21:43 <@sdumitriu> Actually it does start at:  
21:43 <@sdumitriu> New repository initialized by cvs2svn.  
21:43 <@sdumitriu> https://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/trunk@1  
21:43 <@sdumitriu> So nothing was lost actually  
21:43 <vmassol> hey that's cool :)  
21:44 <@sdumitriu> It's just that the full history is not accessible from the master branch  
21:44 <@sdumitriu> Those early commits are reachable from the old tags  
21:44 <vmassol> ok  
21:45 <@sdumitriu> Author: (no author) <(no author)@xwiki.com>  
21:46 <@sdumitriu> So (no author) is actually cvs2svn  
21:46 <@sdumitriu> XWiki CI was me, I did some commits from agent1 without using the right .gitconfig  
21:48 <@sdumitriu> fm should be Fabio  
21:53 <vmassol> ah indeed, I'll add this alias for him  
21:54 <vmassol> (done locally)  
21:55 <vmassol> next step is to install 3.5 on xwiki.org, then I can install the GitHub app there  
21:55 <vmassol> (I'll wait for 3.5 final to be released before upgrading)  
21:55 <vmassol> this committers macro is working quite well :)  
21:56 <vmassol> (the time you run it takes a long time though since it does the git clones)  
22:00 <sburjan`> sdumitriu: around ?  
22:01 <vmassol> sburjan`: fyi http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/GitHub+Application/committers-xwiki-20120219.png  
22:01 <@sdumitriu> sburjan`: Yes  
22:02 <sburjan`> vmassol: wow 17 :)  
22:02 <sburjan`> almost proud of myself  
22:02 <vmassol> :)  
22:04 <sburjan`> sdumitriu: I am still curious about the "Expires" field in http response  
22:04 <@sdumitriu> It's normal so that browsers don't cache the HTML of a page  
22:05 <@sdumitriu> Since it's a wiki, it's supposed to change often  
22:05 <sburjan`> ok, makes sense  
22:05 <sburjan`> but is it set manually to add that date ?  
22:05 <sburjan`> because we also have "Cache-Control no-cache" which does the same trick afaik  
22:06 <sburjan`> vmassol: so the ones who have an x are not actual committers ?  
22:06 <vmassol> they may have been in the past but they're not current committers  
22:07 <sburjan`> I see  
22:08 <vmassol> got to go, bfn  
22:08 <vmassol> has quit  
23:15 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
23:21 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
23:38 <mflorea> has quit  
23:54 <abusenius> has quit
